help.short: ASN of CE devices for CE/PE connectivity. The value should be between 1 to 4294967295. Example: 65123
Configuration to be used to setup the management network.
ARM Resource ID of the Network To Network Interconnect.
Interval in milliseconds. Default Value is 300. Example: 300.
Multiplier for the Bfd Configuration. Default Value is 5. Example: 5.
MTU to use for option A peering. The value should be between 64 to 9200. Default value is 1500. Example: 1500
Peer ASN number. The value should be between 1 to 4294967295. Example: 28.
Vlan Id. The value should be between 501 to 4094. Example: 501
Route Targets to be applied for outgoing routes from CE. This is for backward compatibility.
Route Targets to be applied for incoming routes into CE. This is for backward compatibility.
Route Targets to be applied for outgoing routes into CE.
Route Targets to be applied for outgoing routes from CE.
Route Targets to be applied for incoming routes into CE.
Route Targets to be applied for incoming routes from CE.
Azure resource ID for the NetworkFabricController the NetworkFabric belongs.
Supported Network Fabric SKU. The SKU determines whether it is a single / multi rack Network Fabric.
Number of compute racks associated to Network Fabric. Possible values are from 1-8.
Number of servers.Possible values are from 1-16.
Network and credentials configuration currently applied to terminal server.
Password for the terminal server connection.
Username for the terminal server connection.
